answerText: Sonnets of Death or Los Sonetos de la Muerta[10] This poet of "Death of My Mother," "Tiny Feet," "Paraiso," and "The Artist's Decalogue" wrote "Sonnets of Death." She took her pen name from an Occitan writer.
heading: Terrapin |2013 | Editors 2 - FINAL | 11 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: One of these works states "From the icy niche where men placed you, I lower your body to the sunny poor earth." For 10 points each: [10] Identify this set of three poems inspired by the suicide of Romelio Ureta, which can be found in Desolacion.
